attributes.action: Request to all academic institutions to test fire alarms at specific intervals for some days whenever students in halls tend to disturb other people

If their behaviour is not controlled then, they may tend to commit some type of crime / be addicted to other work because they may be drunk and in addition to this, it will prevent students dating at night time because students say that they are dating but may tend to do something other.
